The WiFi randomly disconnects at various points of the day and would remain off for a while. Data reception also isn't that great, so be prepared for that.

Of all the trips I've taken to California, this hotel was by far the best! The staff was very friend and attentive. The room was GORGEOUS. The property was very beautiful and clean. 12 out of 10 for sure!

We will definitely be coming back here if staying anywheres near the area. Hard to find a quality hotel at a descent price. Really happy with our stay

The receptionist was very friendly and  accommodating. Breakfast is very basic not a lot there. The rooms are clean and very comfortable. Good stay. Would come back any time. They do have free parking.

Service is great, staff are excellent, we have stayed at this location multiple times and have enjoyed our stay every time. lastly the prices are reasonable especially for this area in Southern California.

I really love this place nice quiet peaceful and very nice staffs and especially night shift girl is very good hard worker always making sure guest is very happy with stay of the and checks up on the guest

Loved how nice and clean the hotel was as well as how nice the staff was. Arrived early and was able to check into my room to get a nap before starting my vacation day. I booked the suite and was amazed at how nice and spacious it was. I‚Äôll stay here again for sure  .

It was not up to my expectation for the price. Expected little more variety in the breakfast and little more cleaner hallways. Did not connect to internet as it was unsecured network. Expected to have a secure connection per guest room

Wonderful hotel with the most friendly and courteous staff. Great room and a great price. Great complimentary breakfast buffet. Close to restaurants. Close to Knott's Berry Farm and Disneyland. Close to freeway access. We will stay here again.

We had finished an entire day at Disneyland, and we were exhausted! They got us checked in quick and off to bed! Room was very clean and quiet! It seems they recently had a remodel. Our hallway and room smelled like new carpet. Also I am very tall, 6‚Äô4, the shower head was awesome. Excellent pressure and placed high! Little things that make staying in a hotel great! Summary: The one bedroom suite is great for a family of 4 and I especially liked the separate sink/counter in the living room area which allows other people to get ready while someone else is either taking a shower/using the toilet or using the sink/counter in the bathroom. I also liked that there was a door separating the toilet/shower from the sink/counter. The rooms tended to get very cold and it was difficult to control the temperature. The rooms were clean and spacious, and I liked that the mini fridge stayed cold continuously (there was a two hour timer at the Courtyard Buena Park which was extremely annoying and inconvenient.). The location is also close to the freeway and gas station kitty corner to the centerpointe plaza. It was close to stores and eating establishments. The

This is a wonderful hotel all around! Had a wonderful stay, will definitely be coming back. The beds are very comfortable, the staff very nice, the room and lobby were very clean and inviting. The breakfast bar was good

Plenty of parking Average breakfast Friendly staff Close to main highways Quiet rooms Small TV but nice selection of channels (for the time we spend at the rooms) Easy check in and out Yes I would stay there again.

The hotel staff and breakfast room attendant were wonderful and the rooms are clean and efficiently maintained.  I've come here for 15 years and it seems to get better.  The hall rugs can you replacement but the room carpeting is clean.

Summary Heading: My wonderful and succesful stay and business deal with La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham Buena Park

Summary Heading: My last get-away-for the autumn season!
Summary: I come to this place for much needed rest and relaxation. I enjoy it very much. I feel safe here.  The area is in a quiet area with plenty of businesses nearby!  Hunting‚Äôs Beach is a 40 minute drive from here.

Manager Response: Dear Marilyn A,  Thank you for your recent stay. I have shared your feedback with our team to improve moving forward. Summary Heading: La Quinta Inn  & Suites Buena Park California

Always clean, comfortable and friendly. Location is great for doing the things I need to do when visiting the Southern California area.  Had an early morning flight and they let me check in by 11:00am.

The place is cool and comfortable the bathrooms just need to be remodeled.  Great customer service and friendly staff.  Enjoyed my stay.  Great place to stay and the area is safe and pleasant.  I would recommend

We left it until the next morning and again asked a nice young lady on the front desk and she said we could stay till 2pm. This was very much appreciated. Best La Quinta in So. Cali & very pet friendly. Our yorkie was able to have breakfast with us as long as he was in his stroller and we sat in the lobby. We have stayed at this property twice now and it has become like our home away from home.

Summary Heading: My experience at the Buena Park Hotel
Summary: I really like this hotel and would recomend to anyone. I have stayed at this hotel everytime I'm in the Buena Park area and have been very happy everytime. I like the people, the service and the clenliness and it's close to where I'm going and the ease of check in and out.

Clean hotel, great location. Lots of dining options within walking distance of the hotel. Staff were wonderful and very welcoming.  My husband and I always stay at this hotel when we are in Southern California. Highly recommend.

Summary Heading: Best balance between cost and perfect location!
Summary: Great area with many venues to enjoy your meals, great location between the industrial areas of La Mirada, Santa Fe Springs, & Commerce.   Amazing staff which will welcome you and make you feel like a memeber of the family!!! My favorite location, by far!

I frequent this hotel because of business and it‚Äôs never failed me.  Customer service is great and the rooms are spacious.  Ample parking and it‚Äôs free!  Freeway and plenty of things to eat very close by.

La Quinta was located next to the freeway on and off ramps for either direction (east or west bound).  The number of eating establishments in the La Palma area was excellent.  The parking spaces were located around the hotel and was plentiful.

Dave at the front desk is amazing. The room we had was large and comfortable. The bathrooms were clean but the fan was v er ry loud. The breakfast could be better compared to other la quintas but they are a much larger hotel so I understand.

I used to always pick la Quinta as my #1 choice, but that is not the case anymore. This is my first experience booking it as a Wyndham hotel. Summary Heading: Excellent place to stay if you travel with pets
Summary: We were in LA because of my Son's basketball tournament.  We brought our little Maltese poodle with us and had a great time. This was the best La Quinta we have stayed at.  Grounds were clean, rooms were clean, the fridge in the room was not working but it was replaced right away.  Breakfast was basic but satisfactory.

Management is top notch here and the staff are friendly and very helpful.  The property is centrally located to all places and attractions in SoCal with freeway access a minute from the property.  There are many good food options right near by and the area feels and looks safe. As mentioned by a previous guest that this place was comparable to a Motel 6, this could not be further from the truth.  As a person who travels over 40 days a year this place is a ‚Äúsignificant step up from‚Äù any Motel 6 that I‚Äôve seen.   Perhaps it was sour grapes.  This place while not be the Taj Mahal is not in the same category as a lower rate property like a Motel 6.

Summary Heading: Nice property but away from LA attractions
Summary: The property is great, room was perfect for us, free wifi, free parking, free breakfast. We were visiting LA for 4 days and had a car so we didn‚Äôt care to drive to this hotel every night. The only issue is if you plan to visit LA take traffic into consideration. It takes 60-90 minutes to reach certain attractions in the morning due to traffic.

I will not stay at this hotel again because the night desk clerk has been rude during both of my stays. Once in Dec 2018 and once in April 2019. She is unfriendly and seems constantly annoyed at all aspects of her job.
Manager Response: Dear Happiness 30106523816,  We strive to give the best customer service to every guest. It seems that we fell short during your stay, and I apologize for that. I have used your comments as an opportunity to review our service standards with staff. Your feedback is very much appreciated.

Summary: Room was clean and very quiet. Best night's sleep in ages! Helpful front-desk staff. Breakfast was better than usual continental breakfast fare. Good value. Bath was small but adequate. Would stay here again.

Summary Heading: Good for a pet friendly stay
Summary: We need a place that was pet friendly as we had our puppy with us. The room and lobby was clean, which was my main concern. We didn't have any issues. The breakfast wasn't great. I made waffles the 1st morning and they didn't taste good at all. It had a funny taste. Maybe the waffle iron need a good cleaning. Other than that, the breakfast was just basic: cold cereal, oatmeal, hard-boiled eggs, yogurt, muffins, danishes, and the waffles. I would stay here again if in the area and need a pet friendly hotel.

Summary Heading: Good for a pet friendly stay
Summary: Definitely not a 5 star hotel. Comparable to Motel 6 but will cost you quite a bit more. On a positive note, they are pet friendly!  And close to the freeway, restaurants, and Knotts Berry Farm. Breakfast staff was great.
Manager Response: Dear Navigator53638061909,  Thanks for your review.  I'm pleased you enjoyed our convenient location, pet friendly and great staff.  We apologize our hotel did not meet your standards.  We appreciate you choosing us and hope you will visit us again in the future.

Summary: The breakfast is 99% carbs with only some nasty hardboiled eggs and yogurt cups for protein,  everything else was bread in one form or another.  Coffee was good.  How hard could it be to get better quality food? For an average of $130 per night, the breakfast is from a half price facility.  The staff were very nice and friendly.

It's like a hotel but without room service.  If you want hotel style feel but you aren't big on room service I would stay here.  Right over the Los Angeles County/Orange County line so it is centrally located for the OC amusement parks to seeing stuff in the Long Beach area of LA county.  I'm a LA area native and stay here when I come back home.

While the lobby and exterior look refreshed, the rooms are a bit outdated.  Bathroom could use an upgrade, old bath fixtures and aging.  Rooms could use a refresh too, old style doors that when open interfere with flow of room.  Beds were very comfy though.

Summary Heading: Great location and newly remodeled rooms
Summary: This is my go-to location when I have to do business in the Anaheim area and it never disappoints.  There are many dining options nearby and access to the hotel is very easy.  The staff are always friendly and the rooms are always clean.

Front office was rude, checked us into the wrong room with my ID in her hand and argued with me about who I was.  Room was not cleaned, trash in trash can, papers on floor, poop in toilet.  Was not I could not change rooms, and no one available to clean.  The next day we were gone at 6am. came back at 4:20pm room not cleaned and was told house keeping would not be cleaing it because we came back too soon and they leave at 5pm.

Our stay was excellent!!!! The rooms were clean, the staff was nice and helpfully, and the breakfast was well stocked.Only issue is that the toilets are really low to the ground and they always took 2 flushes.

This hotel need some serious updating. Breakfast is not breakfast just toast and cereal.  We had to call 3 times for extra pillows and wash cloths. Lobby is smaller then other La Quinta we have been too.

This is a very attractive property in a great location with walking distance to multiple food locations. Mostly a quiet stay with all furnishings offered. Quiet clean rooms, with a small breakfast. Recommend for the LA area.

The hotel was much better than I expected.  I stayed in the King Suite and it was very roomy, comfortable and clean.  I had no problems and the staff was nice and helped with any questions I had. I would recommend this for anyone staying in town for Disneyland, Knotts Berry Farm, or just in town.  Very short drive to Disneyland, only 9 minutes! It's also located to a lot of great food places, and the breakfast that is served for free was very delicious.

very dated decor, lovely bed, unfortunately dogs barking and standing in dog urine and the smell of dog urine in the hallway made this stay unpleasant. Dog poo outside maim entrance also. Breakfast was enjoyable

The hotel was clean, fairly quiet, and every employee I interacted with was kind and accommodating. I would stay there again. The only "issue" I experienced was that I could hear the people next to me through the walls but that shouldn't be a problem if you have quieter neighbours.

Pretty good hotel. Wish they had other than eggs for the protein in their breakfast. I don‚Äôt mean to be critical, but the base boards around the room were dirty. There was hair and dust built up. Other than that, good rooms for a reasonable price. I love La Quinta. It‚Äôs my go too hotel for my work. I stay in their hotels 5 days week. Great rewards program. I hope the benefits role over to Wyndham Rewards.

We felt grossed out when we discovered there were several  crocroaches ran around the fridge  and on the walls of our room so we had to throw away our foods which we were stored them in the fridge before we found out about the crocroaches.  It was not a pleasant vacation with a few surprises at that hotel location.

Whether you are attending a Angels game, Knotts Berry Farm, Disneyland, or just working in the area, this location is very conveniently located. The rooms are clean and spacious and the staff for the most part seemed friendly and enjoying their jobs.

I would stay here again. It was clean and comfortable. We had a problem with our air conditioner not working, we called the front desk and maintenance was sent up right away and they fixed it right away. We were satisfied.

Our room was excellent the staff were excellent very clean. I would recommend this hotel. We chose a room with two queen beds and this still gave us plenty of space to move around. It also included free wifi.

Stayed here for 4 days to visit Knott's Berry Farm for my boyfriend's birthday. Being a rewards member, I've stayed at a lot of La Quintas and this one is one of the nicer ones I've had the pleasure of staying at. The manager Nicole was nice as well as the staff, and the room was clean. When we said that we were celebrating a birthday they offered to put a few decorations in the room. It was cute and my boyfriend and I enjoyed the stay so I couldn't have been happier. We had a seventh floor room with a balcony with a view of the snow capped mountains in the distance. All in all, it was

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel but missing some things.

Please thank Jennifer and Michael for me and tell them I appreciate them.

The front desk staff here was very friendly and helpful. Our stay was four days for local sight seeing and Disney visits. The location of this property was great for this type of trip. Our room was very clean, comfortable, and well stocked. The breakfast was typical for the LaQuitas we have visited. There are also several restaurants, a Starbucks and cafes very close to this property which are very convenient. We would recommend and stay here again.

The desk staff is great. The public areas are nice.  The rooms needs major work.  The furniture is scratched up.  There are huge amounts of dust in the corners.  The paint is bubbling and chipping in the bathrooms.  The carpet in the corridors is dirty.  The breakfast is adequate.  The prices are very reasonable, but they really need to invest some time in their lodging.

Summary Heading: Great staff but VERY dated exercise and guest rooms

Summary: This location is always used for business travel and its a great location, nice clean hotel with great service. They try to accommodate our requests and its appreciated. Danielle is such a great asset to your team.
Manager Response: Dear Flyer55488787364,  Thanks so much for your 5 star review!  I'm pleased to see that you enjoy our great location, clean rooms and our accommodating team! I have stayed at this location many times.   The rooms are clean.   The front desk is friendly and helpful.   The housekeeping is also friendly and accommodating.    The location is great for Knotts‚Äô. Disneyland , shopping and more

Hotel and staff were great. Been here a million times this place is always clean and the staff are friendly in fact they are super friendly , I was assisted by Alley and Jenny while I was at the hotel and these girls are on point super fast and just the friendliest smiles ever , the breakfast was bomb like always I love my orange juice and waffles , I‚Äôm looking forward to coming back again soon thanks La Quinta oh and the pet policy is the best !!!!! My room was magnificent love it !!!!

Excellent location near, entertainment, restaurants and limited access highways.  They try hard to please. However, first time in four years (eight stays) we haven't experienced a barking dog in the lobby or when passing an occupied room, their presence in an elevator, nor in the breakfast room.

Bathroom housekeeping was mediocre and faucet handle in the sink was not properly maintained and leaking! Next door occupants are noisy and loud! Prices too high for the quality of the service and room!

I was very happy with my stay and my room.  Very clean room.  Internet was fast.  I liked that breakfast was served later than most hotels I've been to.  It was located right across the street from where I needed to be the next morning.

Summary Heading: Very Terrible and Dirty, No Sleep at all Noisy
Summary: I could not sleep all plumbing noise every 5 minutes or so very loud. Room smelled and was dirty and plenty of pet or human hair very disgusting. Very old paint and carpet looks like a cheap motel. I will never go to any of these hotel chains I really want a refund I couldn't even sleep and when I turn on the heater is smell like mold I had to turn it of. Very bad not a hotel more like a motel. Sorry and I hate leaving bad reviews or comments but is the truth.

Summary: ok hotel for the price. breakfast was below expectations. excellent staff. need room freshners in rooms and hall ways. good location and parking. marie calendar on the corner good place for breakfast.

From the moment I walked into the La Quinta Inn I was greeted by friendly and helpful staff.  The breakfast was perfect and they made sure you had everything to start your day.  The rooms were clean and well stocked.  The room staff were very accommodating and provided everything I needed to be happy, while I was there.  I recommend everyone to stay at this hotel.

Very nice LQ. I brought my dog for the week as I was waiting for an escrow to close. very nice area to walk around outside. many eateries as well. desk staff is friendly. The only downside is the breakfast is mainly cold items-hard boiled eggs and no cooked eggs, sausage or bacon. mainly bread, muffins, hardboiled eggs, waffles, cereals, etc.

This is my "go to" hotel when visiting family in the area.  They have always been accommodating, the staff always professional, and the room always clean.  Their price is approximately $30 less expensive per night than the La Quinta across the street from the location I visit.

Parts of room were not cleaned. Office desk chair was extremely dirty. So much so that I couldn‚Äôt use the desk that I really needed. The bathroom also did not have a proper door. It had closer type doors which was really awkward.

Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: The lobby was very nice as was the Room I'm fortunately it was very small and we had to remove furniture and put on the patio to   accommodate my child's wheelchair. The bathroom was also extremely small. The housekeeping service was adequate she did not even change out the melting ice from the ice bucket. The front desk was very nice and cordial. My number one complaint is the elevator doors. They do not stop when crossing over the barrier and almost shut on my handicap daughter's legs. Trying to stop the door from closing I injured myself. This has been reported to look into but they have yet to return my call. My 2nd complaint is there were far too many dogs on the premises from other guests. This was my second time staying at La Quinta and I love this hotel! I thought the first time was just luck for the price but nope it is great! Clean, great employees all for a great price! I have already booked my next stay in one of their San Francisco locations for next week.

The bed was the most comfortable bed I have ever slept on!  I want one!  Breakfast is always good, they have a lot of different items to choose from.  I love the waffles and my husband enjoys the yogurt and oatmeal selection.

Summary Heading: Hotel is fine, breakfast used to be better
Summary: Hotel is fine, breakfast used to be better. Rooms are good and comfortable. The hot tub was warm but the jets weren't working when we were there. Kids couldn't plug in any electronics to TV, so they were sad.

As a guest of this hotel chain on more than 30 nights each year I have often been very pleased with the quality of service and the value of staying at LaQuinta.  My first impression of this property was every bit as good as some of the best LaQuinta properties I've stayed at. The desk personnel here were outgoing, friendly and efficient. The lobby looked to be freshly redecorated and very clean. Upon arrival at my room, it too looked as though it had been redone within the last couple of years. Clearly, there is a big housekeeping and maintenance problem at this property that needs to be

Summary: Great place to stay! Friendly informative staff was given coupons for Restaurants in area.. clean fresh rooms. Nice environment. Great breakfast! Comfortable clean beds! Great job housekeeping! Nice restrooms! Safe parking! We wil be back , highly recommend!

Everything from checking in to checking out was perfect! Location is perfect for just about everything you need. We will only be staying at La Quinta Inn from now on! Thank you so much for making this trip so awesome!

Our stay was awesome the rooms were clean the beds were soft the staff was friendly having a little snack bar to buy a couple items you needed was nice the breakfast in the morning was good the only downfall to this day was both elevators seemed a little sketchy needed to be maintenance most likely and MTV didn't work on the TV the entire time we were there

This hotel was very clean, friendly staff and a reasonable rate.  They even allow pets.  There was a small issue with the tub faucet dripping and the security latch on the door was a bit loose but over all a good stay.

I stayed the your site located in La Palma. staff is very pleasant and kind. Whenever I travel, La Quinta is my home away from home. I have read several negative complaints about this chain of hotels. However, I have nothing bad to say. I enjoyed my stay.

We had a plumbing issue at home so need a quick answer to an emergency need. This place was great. Staff was great. While it felt dated and the lack of modern a/c units was noisy we still enjoyed our time and would stay again

Manager Response: Dear Robert C,   WOW, thanks so much for your stellar review!! I'm so pleased to hear you enjoyed a wonderful experience at the La Quinta.  Our Bright Side breakfast with delicious waffles and coffee is a perfect way to start your day!  We await your next visit so we can share our hospitality with you again.

Summary: La Quinta Buena Park has a safe off street location with well kept grounds and good parking. The lobby is gorgeous! Rooms are spacious, clean, comfortable and lovely. Staff is helpful and a joy to deal with. La Quinta has the BEST pet policy on the planet!
Manager Response: Dear LaLaLa41,   Thank you for your 5 star rating!  We are pleased to see that you enjoyed our well maintained grounds and beautiful hotel.  We appreciate your highest recommendation and look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: Everyone was willing to help in anyway,  and making our staying comfortable....  We were in California for a funeral....  Everyday we left the hotel to go to our families home,  we couldn't wait to get back to our hotel.....  They make our staying at ease and pleasant.... Great service and pleasant people... Thank you..
Manager Response: Dear Road185588-   Thanks so much for your most wonderful review!  I am pleased that you have ranked our hotel and team a perfect 5!! Our team awaits your next visit so we can share our hospitality with you again.  We'll see you soon!

I have addressed our housekeeping team and will be sure to pay more attention to the details.  I hope your travels bring you back to the area so we can show you the improvements we have made.

Summary: We always stay in your hotel wherever we are having a vacation! Its very clean, affordable, especially you love pets! Good breakfast, very kund soft spoken employee. I will definitely recommend La Quinta to everybody! Stay Cheap an Classy! Thank You
Manager Response: Dear Anactajoseph,  Thanks for your most wonderful review!  We are pleased that you chose La Quinta for your vacation!   A clean hotel and excellent service is our standard!  We look forward to sharing our hospitality with you again!

Summary: Room was not ready until 4:00 PM why does it take a quality hotel 4 hours to get a room ready? I drove 5 hours to get there and then was told to sit down have a cup of coffee and just wait until the room was ready. When i got in the room , the bed sheets were very wrinkled with a blood stain one corner of the top sheet. Disgusting! BTW I  don't drink Coffee. And my dog cannot wait in the lobby while they get the room ready.

We strive to have all of our rooms ready by check-in time, and I completely agree that it is unacceptable we did not have your room ready by then. I will be partnering with my team to find our opportunities to improve our process to have rooms ready by check-in time.  I am also very sorry about the condition of your room. My housekeeping supervisor and I will be investigating what happened and provide the necessary retraining to ensure it never happens again.   Again, I'm sorry we did not provide an exceptional stay for you, and please know that we will be using your feedback to continue to make improvements to our hotel.  Thank you, Shel Assistant General Manager

Summary: Inadvertently, I had an ADA room booked for this stay.  I arrived late, the room was ready, but it was not up to La Quinta standards.  The shower had chips in it and was dirty, the shower chair was old and grungy.  There was dirt in the corners of the bathroom.  And worse, there were blood spots on the blanket.  I arrived late at night and was too tired to complain, but the next morning, Jen at the front desk immediately arranged for a new room for me.  It was an inconvenience to have to move and no one offered assistance.  The new room was wonderful; compliments to Jen for arranging it.  But at check-out, I questioned having to pay for the first night.  I was begrudgingly given 1/2 off.  Personally, I feel I should not have had to pay at all for the first night (I spent 6

Above and beyond customer service! Clean, comfortable rooms and hotel. Very safe and well-lit. Great for all travelers - solo, couples, family, business, and very pet-friendly which is an added bonus! I have always trusted La Quinta and they never disappoint. As a solo female traveler, I always felt safe and comfortable. This location was perfect with great access to everything, especially all the beaches I had come to visit!

The staff were excellent, understanding and guests were understanding of my dog barking due to anxiety, we r fostering a dog and didnt realize this.  The bathrooms were really big and if I had time I would have used their pool.  The breakfast is basic but good nevertheless

Great value, there are nearby restaurants and a Starbucks across the street, very quiet area. Ensure you get down for breakfast a little early, otherwise you won't find a table. Love the late check in time.

I have stayed at this facility on regular bases, im very happy to continue , always enjoy my staythe staff are super friendly and professional at their job.I stay usually from level 5-7 and the rooms and common area are clean and very well maintained last stay was level 2 and it was notable difference  with common area especially needing upgrading to the standard of the other levels.

Everything about the hotel is ok to good.  Rooms are clean, bathrooms are functional.  No restaurant or bar, morning breakfast is primarily bread type foods cereal, waffles, muffins and bagels.  Close to a number of good eating places however from fast food to a nice Italian, Mexican and Comfort food place.  People at the desk are always very friendly.  They allow pets which will be good or bad depending upon your preferences, I am not a pet person so this is a real negative for me.  If you are part of a family going to one of the local amusement parks, this looks like a good place to stay.  A lot of trips have gone through during my stays and the area appears to be a very safe area.  Nice 1/2 mile circle to walk or run goes around the hotel, and a bike trail is not too far

We had a nice stay we were there 5 days slept well on the bed.  We just stayed at the one hotel and just drove to the different places we wanted to see.  Everything on the breakfast bar was good.  We would probably stay here again if ever in Buena Park again

its an awesome place to stay everybody is very nice and helpful. I LOVE it there!!!!! ITS CLOSE TO EVERYTHING and a very clean and nice place to stay.Its a great location because its close to family and friends.

This was a great place to stay and very close to a lot of attractions and museums. Also a good area to get fast food without having to get in the car. The hotel was very clean and the staff was friendly. We did enjoy our stay and have already booked our next stay .

Staff was helpful and efficient. Room was larger than the average with a desk and couch/coffee table area and balcony. We enjoyed the pool. The jacuzzi was warm enough. Helpful to have the fridge and microwave. We'd stay here again.

Reception staff very helpful on arrival and during our stay. Room was excellent with plenty of space, clean and was great having a fridge and USB charging point. Enjoyed the pool and breakfasts. Good location. Will definitely stay there again.

This property is a great place to stay.  It is very clean has pool and spa.  Close to Knotts Berry Farm and the Queen Mary.  Staff is so friendly, rooms are clean.  Free Wi-Fi. I will be staying there again.  This was my first stay at La Quinta.

This hotel was clean and the service was excellent. The room layout was nice and felt very spacious. My preference is to stay at hotels with a restaurant/bar, but at least this one is located near many restaurants.

Summary Heading: Pet Friendliest Hotel in the region
Summary: Everything about this hotel is the top -especially the customer service. Very pet friendly. Check out was a breeze. the breakfast is just enough with good variety. It's quiet in an area that could be lively. Room was spacious. We were upgraded at no extra cost

The staff is friendly as with all La Quinta hotels we have stayed at. Exhausted from travel, we were able to check in early which really saved us. Check in was quick. A big positive was the cleanliness of our rooms. We needed two and both of them were perfect. This goes far in my book.

We highly recommend this hotel to couples and families. Great customer service. Everyone was very friendly and helpful. Breakfast was great and they had many things to choose from. Will definitely recommend to family and friends.

We have been cross country and in California and have enjoyed our stay with La Quinta Hotels They were able to get us the room that we requested. They also had the pet area that was grassy the pets seem to enjoy the grass.  Keep it up

I have stayed at several La Quintas when we havetravelled in the past and this one was not so great. The lobby and parki g were great. However, the room not so much. The ven fan in the bathroom has never been cleaned therefore did nothing in helping ventilation. There were mildew stains in the bathroom which is an indication of poor ventilation. The doors squeaked so loud that if you wone up to use thw bathroom in the middle of thw night everyone would wake up to the squaek in the door.  The speaker and fire alarm in the room had never been dusted. The elevator broke and made for a terrible experience trying to leave. The staff was friendly and polite. The price of a bottle of water from the lobby was $4.00, can we say price gouging? If in the area again I would not stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback. I'm very sorry you did not enjoy your stay with us.  It seems that room needs some extra attention and I will be personally inspecting it and ensuring the proper cleaning procedures occur in the room and that the door squeaking is fixed.   I apologize about an elevator being down while you were departing. Safety is our number one concern, and it was necessary to have our elevator vendor come by and do an inspection of one of the elevators. I know it's frustrating when one of our elevators is down, so I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience.   I'm sorry you were unhappy with the pricing in our Bright Side market. Standard water bottles are $2.00 plus tax, and our 1 Liter bottles of Smart Water are $4.00 due to their larger size. We offer a variety of items in our market place, including drinks, snacks, and frozen meals, for our guests to have the option to purchase.  We inspect our pool and spa on a daily basis to ensure the chemicals are at the correct amount and make sure the water is clean and safe. I'll be checking with my maintenance staff and reviewing our water safety inspection book to make sure the chemicals were at the proper levels. I apologize your family was not able to use our newly renovated pool.   Again, I'm very sorry you did not enjoy your stay with us, that's not the experience I want any of our guests to have. I will definitely be looking into the concerns you mentioned so we can continue to improve our hotel.   Thank you, Shel Dean Assistant General Manager

Summary: It's a great place to stay while on business or even traveling with your family. The have free breakfast every morning. The staff is very friendly and the General Manager is resolve issue very quickly.

This location was in great area, near everything we needed without alot of traffice. Close dining and very clean area of California. I only wished this location had larger rooms , suites or family rooms as some of there other locatios.

Will stay again, I don't know I will for that many days but definitely come back. Bathroom can be a little more clean breakfast was good but they definitely need to be consistent across the board because not everyone serves the same things,  specifically for us that our stay was longer.

Very professional and friendly. Took the stress out of setting everything up. Even let us view the rooms to see if it would be large enough. Gave us Plastic bags for dog clean up, and the fact that our pets were allowed was awesome.

Ice machine didn‚Äôt work, rooms need an upgrade, restroom was a little dirty, and smelled humid inside the hotel room, the lobby is really nicely renovated I wish the rooms were renovated as well to match with the nice entrance
Manager Response: Dear Lizette G,   Thanks for choosing La Quinta Inns & Suites Buena Park.  We know you have many choices in your lodging needs and we appreciate you choosing us!  Please know that we are addressing your feedback accordingly and will be certain to be more attentive to such details.   We hope your travels bring you back to the area again so we can show you the improvements we've made and to share our hospitality with you.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, needs a couple of fixes
Summary: The room is nice and clean. There are many restaurants within walking distance. Pool was fine but the jacuzzi jets weren't working. The breakfast used to have bacon and sausage, but evidently not anymore.

Overall the price was great!!!  However the hallway as soon as you got out the elevator was hot.  Everything in hotel is basic.  My back was sore from the King Size Bed in hotel.  Elevator service runs slow. We stayed there because it was close to Knott's Berry Farm and I had a company discount.
Manager Response: Dear MichellepU2752CG,  Thanks for taking the time to share your recent experience at our hotel.  We are pleased that the price was right, however we apologize for the other inconveniences you experienced.  I have shared your comments with our team for improvement.    We hope your travels bring you back to the area and should you allow us, we would love to show the changes we've made.

Summary Heading: Best Place When Traveling with a Pet
Summary: Whenever I drive to Disneyland with my dog, I stay at this La Quinta. It's clean and comfortable, and the pet area is great.  There's one staff member that I've seen there since 2001 when I first stayed at this LQ. Dave remembers me by name when I return, even though I stay there at most once a year.
Manager Response: Dear L6572DOcharlesk,  Thanks for your review and for being a loyal guest.  I'm pleased to hear that our hotel is clean and comfortable for you and your dog.   Great service is our standard, and I'm thrilled to share your comments with Dave.  See you on your next visit!

Summary: The hotel is my favorite for several reasons Pool, clean rooms, close to restaurants, and friendly staff.  Very safe location. Staff always welcomes me with my Elite water and cookie, even when I forget - they never do!
Manager Response: Dear Maria S,  Thanks for your most wonderful review!  We are excited that you enjoyed our refreshing pool ,clean rooms, and our convenient location!    We appreciate your loyalty to La Quinta and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: The staff at the front desk is the only thing I can recommend about this location. They were very warm and welcoming. The room was in need of a remodel and a fresh coat of paint. The bathroom is tiny and the water pressure in the shower is lacking. The thing that bothered me most was the lack of cleanliness. The floor did not look as though it had been vacuumed and the tile hadn't been mopped. The vent in the bathroom had years worth of dust in it.  It leaves you to wonder what else is there that you can't see.
Manager Response: Dear Smigh12895,  Thanks for taking the time to share you recent experience at La Quinta.    I'm pleased to know you enjoyed our welcoming staff, however, we do apologize for any inconveniences you experienced. Please know that we are working diligently with our team to improve upon these areas.  We look forward to welcoming you back to show you the improvements we have made.

Summary: If you are allergic to pets do not stay here .  Bed is old and sinks to the middle. Second floor smells like wet dog.  I urge you not to stay here it is not worth getting sick .   Room and bathroom dirty .  I would never stay at any La Quintana my first and last .
Manager Response: Dear Joesocalsd,   Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts with us. We deeply regret that we did not deliver an outstanding experience and apologize for these inconveniences.  Should you give us the opportunity to welcome you back, it would be our privilege to better ensure a more valuable experience.

Summary: In pulling up to the hotel, the change was noticeable. Our 12 year old grandson even let out a surprised "OH WOW! Look how clean and pretty (the new flowers) this is." Upon entering, the cleanliness of the lobby and the friendliness of the staff was clear. When we got off the elevator we immediately noticed the carpet was clean. Even the air freshener was now subtle. Prior it seemed they were trying to his the stench. The room was clean and comfortable. The breakfast was much improved. The selection was great and the employees were right on top of cleaning and refilling. The stay  was wonderful! Dave (afternoon/evening front desk) as always is an asset to this business!
Manager Response: Dear Yiayiaeleni3,  Thank you so much for your most wonderful review!  We are pleased that you have noticed the changes we have made to the property and love them as much as we do.    I am thrilled to share your review with our team and we look forward to sharing our hospitality with you on your next visit.

Summary: This inn would not let us check in on the mobile app. between 12 noon and 3:30 pm. When we got there at 3:30 pm we inquired why we were not allowed to check in , the woman Ellie (?) told us that our room was not ready that's why we could not check in. But when we got there the room was miraculously ready?  we were assigned a room on the third floor and we asked for a higher floor room. She told us the type of room we booked we can only stay on the third floor.  Another lady that was there heard us and gave us a room on the sixth floor.  This woman was very unprofessional and  in our opinion treated us with disrespect.
Manager Response: Carol,   Thank you for your review.  We would like to extend our sincerest apologies for the inconveniences you experienced during your stay.  The lack of professionalism and concern that you described is certainly not the standard code of conduct.  We will be forwarding your feedback to the hotel management team to be reviewed and addressed.  We do hope you will choose to stay with us again so we can have the opportunity to provide you with a better experience.  Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: We enjoyed our stay.  La Quinta was at the perfect location to where our family home was located.  This made it make a perfect visit to LA.  We highly recommend this particular hotel to anyone visiting the area.

I would not stay here again. The staff was great, but the double room literally means "double-sized" beds. Not very comfortable for a family of 4. Also there was no meat or eggs included with breakfast (unless you count hard boiled eggs). Lastly, the carpet in our room smelled slightly of pet urine.

Summary Heading: Good area, location works for a lot of purposes
Summary: I stay here a couple of times a year for business, and it's one of the few properties where I'll stay for both business and pleasure trips!  Nice property with great rooms.  Several restaurants within walking distance. Easy access to the 91 Freeway gets you anywhere you need to be.  It's our family's preferred hotel for a Disney weekend... far enough away that parking isn't a problem, but close enough for easy access.  Rooms are nice, elevators are reasonably fast.  Not every room has a fridge, so be sure to book a room that specifies it if you need it.  Staff has always been very friendly and helpfu..

Summary Heading: The price is not worth it.
Summary: Pretty decent area. Traveling with my two kids and we had been driving all night. When they told me it was extra to have a fridge and microwave. I wanted to leave but I couldn‚Äôt. Rediculous! Never again

Clean and quiet. The location has minimal freeway noise, unlike most hotels. Breakfast is the usual hotel fare with those strange malted waffles. But bring your own cream for coffee as they only have dairy-free creamer with flavors.

The king size bed was quite wonderful, the bathroom was a little small to my liking but was very clean and my husband loved that they had the same shampoo and conditioner we use at home. The staff were very nice and accommodating.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! I'm so glad to see you enjoyed your stay with us and that our staff was nice and accommodating.   We hope to see you again on a future stay to Orange County.  Thank you, Shel Dean Assistant General Manager

Summary: Nice hotel  friendly staff.  Rooms were good size and the bed was clean and comfortable.   Breakfast was a disappointment.   Absolutely no protien. Breakfast area was clean and well attended. Pool was nice.

I stay here frequently, they are usually packed and very busy being so close to Disneyland,  but the staff knows me and is always pleasant and accomodating, check in and check is out, my company spends a lot of money here, and it is well worth it

Summary Heading: No surveillance cameras installed outside of this hotel
Summary: I am extremely dissatisfied with this hotel.  I would not recommend it to anybody at all. I had a terrible experience at this hotel. The parking lot is very poorly lit and they have no security around parking area. Someone broke into my car and stole property from it. I will never come back to this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Patty,  We're so sorry this unfortunate incident occurred during your stay. I can understand that something like this is beyond frustrating and not at all how you wanted your vacation to go. When the incident occurred we contacted our corporate offices to reach out to you and assist, as well as fully cooperate with the local police department to pass on any necessary information. We understand that they are in contact with you and assisting further.  Our parking lot is fully lit, and the commercial complex we are in does have a roaming security patrol in the evenings that drive through our lot periodically. We try to provide the safest environment possible for all of our guests during their stay.   Again, I'm so sorry that this happened to your family.  Thank you, Shel Dean Assistant General Manager

Summary: Free parking and very convenient location. There are several restaurant just 5 minutes walk from the hotel. Free Wifi with breakfast with great coffee. Front desk is very helpful. We booked Two double bed with military price. There's no refrigerator or microwave in our bedroom I am not sure why but never get any offer from the front desk nor question them about these. The bathroom faucet was popped out from the tub but shower is still working so we didn't call for maintenance .  We had a funeral last week in the area and most of our family flew from other States or drove several hours from different City. So it is just really convenient location for quick stay for 2 nights.

The La Quinta in Buena Park is one of the better LQ's I've stayed at. They have recently remodeled and the staff is always friendly and helpful. Walking distance to several good places to eat and close to freeway access. The La Quinta rewards program is also exceptional.

Summary Heading: Excellent value with a few exceptions
Summary: Everything about this hotel was excellent except for 2 items.  MSNBC is not available on their TVs while CNN and FOX are available.  I have stayed in all of the other large hotel chains and all have had that TV station. As far as breakfast goes, most of the foods available are carbohydrate based.  The only protein I could find were hard-boiled eggs.  Also, real dairy cream for the coffee did not appear to be available. Otherwise, the hotel is a great value and is very comfortable.

The room was small but comfortable.  Very clean inside premises and outside. Close to many varieties of restaurants and food.  Minimal breakfast offerings. Additional area of seating available for breakfast.  I appreciated the quiet atmosphere.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel and good prices too!
Summary: Excellent hotel! Great location... close to Knott‚Äôs and Disneyland. Room was very spacious and clean. Bathroom could have used a little extra cleaning but other than that great stay! Staff were very helpful and friendly.

After having driven eight hours we were pleased to check into our room. The hotel had a crisp, modern look-and-feel and the cleanliness and service were top-notch. We would definitely stay here again!

Quiet, clean, staff always there but not seen....not all over you. When you needed them they were there. Very conveniently located to other services. Light traffic in and out. I will surely remember La Quinta when I need a hotel in the future.

Overall this hotel is OK and convenient to the 91 freeway however its starting to get in need of renervation. The hallway carpets definitely are in need of cleaning and the rooms are getting a bit dated.

We stayed at the LaQuinta Inn-Buena Park for a weekend. The staff was very friendly and the service was great. I would recommend this hotel to friends and family. The hotel is close to shopping centers and restaurants.

My expectation were admittedly low for this property, and was very pleasantly surprised.  Well located, easy to find, ample free parking, clean and quiet - what more could you ask for!?!   I have been staying at a number of La Quinta's around the western US and have been impressed...not something easily done with all my traveling.  I would stay here again and would recommend this property to anyone!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! I'm so glad we could exceed your expectations and give you a great stay. We hope to see you on future travels to Southern California.  Thank you, Shel Dean Assistant General Manager

Summary: I‚Äôve stayed at this hotel many times in the past.   It‚Äôs a great lication for Knotts, Disneyland and beaches.   I have to dogs and they have a nice dog potty area.   The rooms are nice and always clean.   The breakfast is a typical la Quinta hotel breakfast.

Summary Heading: Everything is good but bathroom needs to be updated.
Summary: Hotel staffs are very friendly.  Overall nice clean hotel but bathroom needs to be renovated.   Especially shower and bathtub. I think this hotel can make guests happy if they can upgrade their bathroom.

Was here for a basketball tourny, so didn't need anything fancy and was very satisfied.  Our king bed was comfortable, clean room and close to good food and amenities.  Aside from a lumpy pull out bed (sorry son!) it was a good value at only $134.

close to keystone lanes very clean lots of shopping centers nice area close to disneyland, universal studios magic mountain traffic is alot lots of eating places lots of things to do permitting weather
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! I'm so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. It is nice to be close to so many attractions and restaurants, and I love hearing that our guests enjoy our location. If your travels bring you back to this area we hope to see you again!  Thank you, Shel Dean Assistant General Manager

Summary: A bit pricey for the state of the room. The bathroom had mold along with the sink faucet. The hallway had a musty smell, like old carpet. The mattress was very worn. This property could use an update.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your review. I'm so sorry you did not enjoy your room. I would appreciate it if you would reach out to me at the hotel with your room number, I want to personally inspect the room and go over it with my maintenance supervisor so we can make the necessary updates to that room with the sink and the mattress.   I'm having a commercial carpet cleaning company come out to do the hallways today, and I apologize you had to experience them when they were not freshly clean.  Again, thank you for your feedback, and please reach out to me with your room number so I can address that room.  Thank you, Shel Dean Assistant General Manager

Summary: I was pleasantly surprised when I arrived at the La Quinta in Buena Park. I paid a substantially low price for my room and yet I pulled up to a beautiful luxury hotel. The grounds were immaculate and the lobby was beautifully decorated and welcoming. I will definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. I'm so glad you had a great stay with us and that you found your stay a good value. We've recently put more attention into our landscaping outside to create a more welcoming and attractive entrance for our guests, so it's great to hear you enjoyed our grounds. I'm happy to hear you would stay with us again, and we look forward to seeing you on a future trip!  Thank you, Shel Dean Assistant General Manager

Summary: I enjoy staying at La Quinta Hotels, this one was definitely showing its age but you can tell they have been working on updating and upgrading things around the hotel. We did have a few issues with things but the customer service more than made up for it,  the desk clerk on duty Nicolas was amazing! He went above and beyond to try and make sure every guest was taken care of and kept an upbeat attitude even tho he was the only one on shift and it was a busy night. The clerk in the morning (I didn't get her name) was also super helpful and friendly. I would stay at this property again solely based on their team members efforts to make our stay amazing.
Manager Response: Hello Tabitha, Thank you so much for the kind words about our staff. Everyone here strives to provide the best possible customer service to everyone staying here. I'll make sure to share your praise at our next employee meeting.   Again, I appreciate your comments and if your travels bring you back to Orange County we hope to see you again soon!  Thank you, Shel Dean Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: All I expect from a La Quinta
Summary: We stayed 1 night en route from northern CA to AZ and were only in need of a comfortable place to sleep. This La Quinta fit the bill. It is very convenient to highway 91. We were upgraded to a king suite on the 7th (top) floor which is two huge rooms (Living room with couch, recliner, desk and chair, sink, fridge and microwave.  Bedroom with king bed, two night tables, and recliner. Huge bathroom.) All standard La Quinta amenities at a decent price.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We are very happy to hear that our staff and service met your needs and expectations.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta and look forward to your next visit!    Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: Experiences two rooms and both low quality. Leaking ac unit and 2nd room very dingy. Low quality comforter and fixtures old, tub had moldy rubber band on bottom of tub. I was greeted with a toilet smell once I open the door. Breakfast should be monitor, out of coffee, low quality muffins and bagels. There was a fight over the coffee. Not a good experience to have in the morning. Staff was excellent! They were so professional. I felt bad that they had to represent this hotel.
Manager Response: Lisa,   Thank you for your candid feedback. We are very sorry to hear that the hotel was not up to par in the areas mentioned.  Please note this information has been passed on to our management staff to ensure improvements are considered and made. We very much appreciated your business and thank you for staying with us.    Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: Hotel in a business center; lots of parking spaces. Close to Freeway 91, but not noisy. Good variety of eating places within walking distance. Clean rooms but small bathroom. Good working HVAC which was not noisy or smelly or dusty. Good wi-fi reception/good internet connections.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! I'm glad to see you enjoyed your stay. I'm always thankful that this location is close enough to have easy to access the freeway but just far enough away that we don't hear it. I'm also glad to see you liked our Wi-Fi, we recently upgraded the system and I'm glad to see it's working out for our guests. If your future travels bring you back to the Buena Park area we hope to see you again.  Thank you, Shel Dean Assistant General Manager

Summary: Convienent location, quiet and great value. Visited family and friends. Childhood home, favorite restaurants and saw growth of the area. Only had one night so did not have time to enjoy pool. Good bteakfast.
Manager Response: Carol,  Thank you for staying at La Quinta Inns and Suites. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for your comments and we wish to welcome you back to the hotel soon!          Sincerely, Diana ‚Äì LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Prepare to wait for the elevator a lot
Summary: Me, my husband, my two kids, and two dogs stayed at the La Quinta in La Palma in order for us to visit Knott‚Äôs Berry Farm on a Saturday. The rooms are clean and the staff is friendly. The breakfast has your standard fare: bread and bagels, cereal and oatmeal, yogurt and fruit, and waffles. No ‚Äúhot food‚Äù (scrambled eggs, biscuits and gravy etc). The coffee is pretty good in my opinion.   The biggest downside of this hotel is the elevator. We stayed on a Friday and Saturday night and our room was on the 7th floor (the very top floor). The wait for the elevator can add up to 10 minutes to any endeavor. There are stairs but we never took them so I don‚Äôt know where they let out or how to access them from the lobby level.   Our stay was very nice and quiet, but there were several
Manager Response: Hello Kerry, Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. I'm so sorry you had long waits for the elevator, I understand that can be extremely frustrating. I'm going to reach out to our elevator company and see if we can adjust the floors the elevators wait on or make any upgrades to try to speed them up for our guests.   I appreciate your comments on our clean rooms and friendly staff. We try our best to provide the highest level of service we can to our guests. And I'm very happy to see you enjoyed our coffee, we recently switched it out to a different brand based on guest feedback and I love hearing that it's working out.   Again, I really appreciate your feedback, and if your travels bring you back for another visit to our local theme parks we hope to see you again.  Thank you, Shel Dean Assistant General Manager

Summary: Room was clean, Front Desk very helpful. Pool was under repair, (darn) but overall it was a good stay. Breakfast was really good, the hostess did a good job of keeping it stocked and clean. The Hotel was clean and well kept up.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your review! I'm so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. I appreciate your kind words about our breakfast attendant, I'll be sure to pass your praise on to her. I'm sorry you weren't able to enjoy our pool area. I understand it was frustrating for our guests while it was being renovated, but I'm happy to report our new pool area is open! We hope that if you visit Orange County again you can stay with us and enjoy the new pool.   Thank you, Shel Dean Assistant General Manager

Summary: Booked the La Quinta Hotel for relatives coming into town, since I frequently stay at La Quinta for business, and I know how great the accommodations are.  Minor mix-up in the room type from the reservation to what was actually given, but the staff quickly made the appropriate adjustment.  The rooms are always nice and clean and the breakfast in the mornings is a great perk.
Manager Response: Ryan, Thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay and for your kind words about our efficient staff.  We are delighted to hear that your enjoyed our nice, clean accommodations and our complimentary breakfast.  We look forward to having them stay with us again soon.  Sincerely,	 Bennie, LQ Customer Care Agent

Summary: I really enjoy this particular La Quinta.  The staff is very friendly, the rooms are very clean, and it's in a great location.  No matter what time of day, there's always someone behind the counter to help with a smile on their face.
Manager Response: Michelle, Thank you for taking the time to post a review and for your kind words about our friendly staff.   We are delighted that you had a good stay and enjoyed our location and our clean rooms.  We look forward to having you as our guest again in the future.    Sincerely,	 Bennie, LQ Customer Care Agent

Summary: This is the second time i stay at this hotel.Hotel needs renovation in room.Bedrooms, Carpet,Bathroom and Furniture.Breakfast needs to be updated and enough space for other guest to seat down instead i had to eat breakfast in my room.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for feedback regarding your recent stay.  We are extremely sorry that our hotel didn‚Äôt meet your expectations.  Our guests‚Äô satisfaction is very important to us and when we fall short; we take it very serious.  Your comments have been forwarded to management, so they can look at options to upgrade and better serve our guests.  While we cannot change the outcome of your stay, we do hope you will stay with us again in the future for a better guest experience. Sincerely, Bennie, LQ Customer Care Agent

Summary Heading: I got to bring my dogs!
Summary: We chose La Quinta because of my parents whenever they travel they always stay at one. They have a dog and like it there. So I booked our weekend getaway and thought it was so much easier to take the dogs instead of finding a sitter or boarding them. The staff was so nice and helpful!! Just check your bed before you get in.I didn't notice till it was too late my kids were already asleep when I saw blood stains on the sheets. The sheets were clean but it still freaked me out. That is my only complaint.
Manager Response: Cassandra,   Thank you for taking the time to write such a great review!  Your informative feedback will surely help our future guests with their travels. Summary: Love this la Quinta. Awesome front desk personnel, i have stayed here in many occasions on business, you have many restaurants to choose from, all within walking distance, rooms always clean and smell very good..what i also love about this particular La Quinta is that you can get a balcony if desired...

We arrived in the late evening, and the parking lot was well lit. The rooms are all off interior corridors. We felt very safe. The check in was very smooth and the front desk attendants (both at night and in the morning) were very friendly and helpful. Sorry folks I didn't eat breakfast and still gave it five stars.

Friendly staff, clean rooms, easy check-in and check-out.  Would stay here again if I return to the area.   Cons...Carpet in hallway on 4th floor needs replacing. Breakfast set-up lacks scrambles eggs, biscuits, meat, gravy etc.

Summary Heading: Nice inexpensive place to stay with family
Summary: The hotel was refinished since the last time we stayed there.  My family was only there long enough to get some sleep and then head back to Disneyland the next day.  We didn't check out the pool or any other amenities because we were so tired everyday.  The only issue we had during our stay was that the breakfast compared to other La Quinta Inns was lacking.  We are used to getting Sausage patties and scrambled eggs in the morning but those were not present.  They offered some bananas, bread, bagels, hard boiled eggs, oatmeal packets and waffles.

We always stay here when we visit our grandchildren nearby.  It's always a good choice.  East to find; right off the interstate;  good breakfasts;  easy parking; good prices.  It's hard to add anything more because La Quinta is a good brand and this hotel is a good hotel.

Sara at the front desk was wonderful. She told us of several restaurants in walking distance. Hotel was big with plenty of parking. Small but adequate pool and hot tub. Spacious rooms with a working desk. We ate at a very pleasant restaurant called A'mour. lots of people staying here we're headed towards Disneyland or Knotts Berry farm.

Within a business district. Lots of good restaurants around.  Very clean, modern & handy if your visiting Knott's Berry Farm, Long Beach, south LA County/north Orange County.  Even had a little balcony outside my room but too hot to use!

This is among the best hotels you're going to find in the area of Cerritos without going crazy on pricing. The rooms are nice and clean, the breakfast is simple, and it has a workout room that is better than 80% of all exercise areas in hotels. It's close to food place and the interstate.

This hotel is simple and clean. Everything you need for a place to sleep. Breakfast is a little poor. Service is good. It's located in middle of the vast LA urban area, so it's easy to get to any place.

Stayed at this hotel for four nights with family. The hotel was good and comfortable. Enjoyed breakfast. It is conveniently located between Los Angeles and Anaheim.The hotel itself is near to Cerritos Mall and has many good restaurants nearby.

This place was a pretty comfortable stay. - They had breakfast in the mornings that offered a bit more than most places. - It is located in a pretty safe part of La Palma in a good location within walking distance to a few nice places to eat. - The only complaint I have is that the elevator was sooooo slow. - Other than that it was a good experience. - I would definitely stay here again.

I've stayed at this location numerous times for business.  The night manager remembers me an provides a cordial greeting.  The location is close to freeways but not next to it.  It is quiet and connections in the LA & Orange County area are easy. There is a Marie Calendar's within walking distance for breakfast, lunch or dinner.

Friendly staff, clean rooms, great breakfast, pool, workout room. Close to Disneyland or LA attractions. We stay here several times a year. We were taking our son to college. There are plenty of good places to eat within walking distance.

We stayed at this hotel because we were visiting Medieval Times and Knotts Berry Farm and it super close to both.  The only complaint about this hotel was that one of the two elevators they had, was out of order the entire weekend and from what I could tell, the hotel was booked to capacity so having to wait every time was irritating and it was slow.  The room was as clean and did not smell.  I always check the mattresses and there were no stains or evidence of bugs.  The bathroom was clean and AC worked perfectly.  Free wifi and typical La Quinta free breakfast; boiled eggs, yogurt, fruit, muffins, oatmeal, cereal, waffle maker, bagels, toast, coffee and juice.  The staff was super friendly and I would stay here again.

Great hotel, and a nice location with several restaurants in walking distance. VERY PET FRIENDLY!! Professional and friendly hotel staff.  The only complaint was the fact that the hotel's elevators are EXTREMELY SLOW.

We were mostly pleased with our stay at this hotel.  Only problem was other dog owners who don't get that you're supposed to clean up after your dog so other dogs and their owners don't step in it.  Interior rooms are immaculately kept but it might be necessary to hire someone to walk the grounds outdoors to pick up paper litter.

Went for a couple days for a weekend getaway. We got there Friday, only one elevator was working, left Sunday, still only one elevator was working. The volume of visitors to this hotel really requires two operational elevators. You had to wait a long time. Our first night we were woken up by a bunch of teenagers around 3 am, screaming, shouting, banging on doors on our floor. Found out it was a High School Marching Band from Iowa in town. Another guest spoke with their chaperone, who was extremely rude. The pool was small. The Marching Band left and a bunch of Soccer Teams came in, so the free breakfast was crowded. This hotel gets a lot of traffic. Lots of choices around the hotel to eat.

First, the staff are kind and professional. I had a mix-up with a company credit card, and they were patient with me while it was worked out and let me stay my first night without drama. I LOVE them for that. Dave and Danielle especially. Room was clean. Nice little pool and hot tub. Didn't use the workout room, but it looked well equipped.  Downside: Air conditioner works based on motion-sensing. So, in the middle of the night, it got hot until I stood up and awakened it. No in-room coffeemaker.  Shampoo only, no conditioner or lotion. I wish the free breakfast also included hot protein such as eggs, but the coffee is good.  I plan on traveling to this area several times a year, and if I'm booked in this La Quinta again, I won't be unhappy. But I could be more pleased.

I really enjoyed my stay at your hotel. great service and clean and friendly staff.It  was cool and a peaceful atmosphere to walk into from this terrible heat. Even the cool water pitcher on the table as I entered the facility was very welcoming. Thank you

Great Hotel.. Easy Free way access.  Pool was warm and plenty of towels.  Room was great and we enjoyed our stay.  Breakfast was great and lots to pick from.  We will be booking again.  I can't think of anything to complain about.....

First time using this La Quinta. Was not visiting for Disneyland, majority of guests were. Hotel was great. Super clean. Rooms were very nice. Check-in was quick an easy. Overall quality was better than the La Quinta Hawaiin Gardens, which we stayed at in April.

Summary Heading: Very good hotel that can get even better.
Summary: The only thing about the LaPalma location that brings a sour look to my face is the breakfast. Recently the only thing that I get from the breakfast area is coffee. Never cared for continental breakfast.

Summary Heading: Big room, walk to 20+ restaurants and coffee shop
Summary: Decent hotel, pet-friendly, free breakfast.  Pro: big, cozy, lobby remodelled so looks good. walk to 20+ restaurants and coffee shop so for business trip, no car needed if the office is nearby.   Con: Found pet hair on the carpet: if you are not a pet person, this may trigger allergy. Equipemtn in the fitness room are not working, and many needs to be repaired‚Äã.

While the room itself was clean, the hallway carpet on my floor looked like it hadn‚Äôt been vacuumed in a week. In the end, the constant noise would keep me from staying here again.

Summary: I was pleased enough with most of the motel's offerings, but the fitness room equipment was needing maintenance to restore the equipment to full operating condition.    In addition, the toilet in our room did not work properly.  The handle was oriented so that the toilet could not be flushed without moving the top of the toilet.

The hotel staff were great.  The room was clean, but the pillows were not comfortable.  We had our two dogs with us and we all felt welcome.  The only real negative we had was the breakfast which was sub par.

Summary Heading: Nice room but closet sized bathroom
Summary: The overall appearance of the room was very nice, but was very disappointed with the bathroom. It had double closet like doors and was very claustrophobic.  Was only there one night on business so not too big of a deal but was disappointed.

Summary Heading: Regular stay for LA business trips
Summary: I stay here about 8 nights per month and love the location, breakfast is waffles, cereal, juice and toast/bagel, boiled eggs....everything is always fresh.  They always have my favorite room ready.  I dont interact much with the staff but when I do, they have always been friendly and polite.  This is also a pet friendly hotel from what I have seen and that has never been an issue either.  Good nights sleep, close to the highway, Disney, plenty of restaurants close by also.

Breakfast was ok. Staff was extremely nice and helpful. Hotel is close to Disney and LA. Rooms were clean but the only downside was the smell of the bathroom. Could have used an airfreshner or something to cover the smell.

We stayed here the night before my daughters wedding.  I have to say I was very pleasantly surprised.  It was very clean nice amenities. The breakfast was just perfect for a finicky bride... Thank you La Quinta... it was a great experience..

Big hotel in good looking cation near restaurants if you are in this part of LA. The room was big, bed was comfortable. Breakfast is fair. Internet connection is good. But, few thing disturbed me: the bath is old. Part of it outside, in the room... They will not give you new shampoo (I stayed for 6 nights- refilled only once). The elevator was usually dirty. once I wanted to use local phone Nd order myself a pizza. I was told that only the call will cost me 5-6 USD... More then al whole pizza.... I skipped it, and do not understand hotels that charge this amount for letting me have local phone call.. Overall - average minus.

This hotel does not hold your reservation of choice. If you don't arrive before the large groups they will move you to whatever room is available, NOT what you reserved. The room we were in was not satisfactory. The room custodian does not check the problems that exist. They just change the supplies. The toilet was loose, no hooks for clothing,no refrigerator.

Summary: great location nice friendly staff perfect hotel for a nice La get away. nearby to Santa Monica enough for an easy drive and not to far from the orange county. I look forward to staying at other La quinta suites because I was blown away!
